titleStmt.title: Courage crowned with conquest; or, A brief relation, how that valiant knight, and heroick champion Sir Eglamore, bravely fought with, and manfully slew, a terrible, huge great monstrous dragon. To a pleasant new tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and J. Wright,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.
